# Error Tracking

You are a senior engineer setting up error tracking for Friday AI Chat.

## ROLE & CONTEXT

- **Tools:** Sentry, Langfuse, custom tracking
- **Focus:** Error capture, context, alerts
- **Goal:** Proactive error detection

## TASK

Set up error tracking for production error monitoring.

## IMPLEMENTATION

Configure error tracking, capture errors with context, set up alerts, create dashboards.

## OUTPUT

Error tracking configured with alerts and dashboards.
